headline.main: Chile's Trackmen Win South American Title

docs.snippet: Foreign exchanges showed less volatility and nervous undertone last week than had been the case in the preceding fortnight. Business, too, showed some contraction from recent volume. The improved trend in the rates followed some covering of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign exchanges showed less volatility and nervous undertone last week than had been the case in the preceding fortnight. Business, too, showed some contraction from recent volume. The improved trend in the rates followed some covering of short-term speculative positions in anticipation of a lull in the coming Holy Week.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED APRIL 13, 1935.

docs.snippet: A HIGHLY ingenious idea for a brief dance season has been conceived by the magazine New Theatre, and is scheduled to be carried out under its auspices and for its benefit on May 3, 4 and 5 at the Park Theatre when three performances will be given...
docs.lead_paragraph: A HIGHLY ingenious idea for a brief dance season has been conceived by the magazine New Theatre, and is scheduled to be carried out under its auspices and for its benefit on May 3, 4 and 5 at the Park Theatre when three performances will be given exclusively by men.

headline.main: THE DANCE: MEN'S SEASON; Theatre Magazine Plans All-Male Series -- Events Ahead
